metadata.title: CVE-2018-12268 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: acccheck.pl in acccheck 0.2.1 allows Command Injection via shellmetacharacters in a username or password file, as demonstrated by injectioninto an smbclient command line.

criterions.comment: acccheck: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
